Feature.Name: Undead
Feature.Text: The item incorporates imagery of death—such as bones and skulls, and it might be crafted from parts of corpses. It feels cold to the touch.

MagicProperty.Name: Creator - Undead
MagicProperty.Description: The item incorporates imagery of death—such as bones and skulls, and it might be crafted from parts of corpses. It feels cold to the touch.
